query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Benigna volontade in che si liqua 2 sempre l’amor che drittamente spira, 3 come cupidità fa ne la iniqua,
query.error: **English:** 1 Benign will in which is always liquefied 2 the love that rightly inspires, 3 as lust does in the wicked,
query.result: 1 Saumya icchā yasyām sadā dravībhūtaḥ 2 premaḥ yaḥ samyak spandayati, 3 yathā kāmaḥ karoti pāpini,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 silenzio puose a quella dolce lira, 5 e fece quïetar le sante corde 6 che la destra del cielo allenta e tira.
query.error: **English:** 4 imposed silence on that sweet lyre, 5 and made those holy strings quiet 6 that the right hand of heaven loosens and tightens.
query.result: 4 tasyām madhura-vīṇāyām maunaṃ cakāra, 5 evaṃ ca śāntāḥ babhūvuḥ pavitra-tantrayaḥ 6 yān ākāśasya dakṣiṇaḥ hastaḥ śithilīkaroti ca ākarṣati ca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 Come saranno a’ giusti preghi sorde 8 quelle sustanze che, per darmi voglia 9 ch’io le pregassi, a tacer fur concorde?
query.error: **English:** 7 How could those substances be deaf to just prayers, 8 which, to make me desire 9 that I should pray to them, were in agreement to be silent?
query.result: 7 Katham bhaviṣyanti nyāyapūrṇeṣu prārthanāsu baധīrāḥ 8 tāḥ vastu-saṃghātaḥ, yāḥ me prārthanāyāḥ pravṛttim janayitum 9 maunaṃ cakruḥ paraspara-sammatipūrvakam?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 Bene è che sanza termine si doglia 11 chi, per amor di cosa che non duri 12 etternalmente, quello amor si spoglia.
query.error: **English:** 10 It is right that he should grieve without end 11 who, for love of a thing that does not last 12 eternally, strips himself of that love.
query.result: 10 Ucitameva yathā anantatāṃ prāpnoti śokaḥ 11 yasya, anityasya vastunaḥ prema-nimittam 12 nityam prema-tyāgam karoti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 22 na ca maṇiḥ svakasmāt pattāt praviviktaḥ, 23 api tu radiyātmikāyām rekhāyām sañcarati, 24 alabastrasya paścāt agnir iva pratibhāti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 Sì pïa l’ombra d’Anchise si porse, 26 se fede merta nostra maggior musa, 27 quando in Eliso del figlio s’accorse.
query.error: **English:** 25 Thus Anchises' shade showed itself, 26 if our greatest muse deserves faith, 27 when in Elysium he noticed his son.
query.result: 25 Evam Anchiseḥ chāyā āvirbabhūva, 26 Yadi śraddhā arhati asmākam uttamā mūṣā, 27 Yada Elysium-e putrasya ajānat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 «O sanguis meus, o superinfusa 29 gratïa Deï, sicut tibi cui 30 bis unquam celi ianüa reclusa?».
query.error: **English:** 28 "O my blood, O grace of God poured down, 29 to whom was the gate of heaven ever opened twice, 30 as it was to you?"
query.result: 28 "He rakta mama, he Devasya anugrahaḥ avatīrṇah, 29 yathā tava, yasmāt dvidhā api svargasya dvāraṃ vikasitam, 30 katham anyasmāt?"

query.prompt:

query.prompt:

query.error: **English:** 133 Mary gave me, called in loud cries; 134 and in your ancient Baptistery 135 together I was Christian and Cacciaguida.

query.prompt:

query.prompt:
